<script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A","jQuery","cf").execute(function(A,$){
    window.registeredDDMCountdown || P.register("DDMCountdownComponent",function() {
        var countdonwHandler;
        return {
            init: function(ddmContext) {
                countdonwHandler || (countdonwHandler = new CountdownHandler(ddmContext));
            },
            start: function(fastSecondsLeftToOrder,cheapSecondsLeftToOrder) {
                countdonwHandler.start(fastSecondsLeftToOrder,cheapSecondsLeftToOrder);
            },
            stop: function() {
                countdonwHandler.stop();
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredDDMCountdown = true;
    
    function CountdownHandler(ddmContext) {
        var strings = ddmContext.strings;
        var asin = ddmContext.asin;
        var shippingMessageSectionId = ddmContext.shippingMessageSectionId;
        var fastCountdownElementId = ddmContext.fastCountdownElementId;
        var cheapCountdownElementId = ddmContext.cheapCountdownElementId;
        var showAndInCountDown = ddmContext.showAndInCountDown;

        var fastCountdownTimer = null;
        var cheapCountdownTimer = null;

        this.start = function(fastSecondsLeftToOrder,cheapSecondsLeftToOrder) {
            this.stop();
            if (fastCountdownElementId && fastSecondsLeftToOrder > 0) {
                fastCountdownTimer = new CountdownTimer(strings,asin,shippingMessageSectionId,
                        fastCountdownElementId,fastSecondsLeftToOrder,showAndInCountDown);
                fastCountdownTimer.start();
            }
            if (cheapCountdownElementId && cheapSecondsLeftToOrder > 0) {
                cheapCountdownTimer = new CountdownTimer(strings,asin,shippingMessageSectionId,
                        cheapCountdownElementId,cheapSecondsLeftToOrder,showAndInCountDown);
                cheapCountdownTimer.start();
            }
        };
        this.stop = function() {
            if (fastCountdownTimer) {
                fastCountdownTimer.stop();
                fastCountdownTimer = null;
            }
            if (cheapCountdownTimer) {
                cheapCountdownTimer.stop();
                cheapCountdownTimer = null;
            }
        };
    };

    function CountdownTimer(strings, asin, shippingMessageSectionId, countdownElementId, secondsLeft,showAndInCountDown) {
        this.secondsLeft = secondsLeft;
        this.intervalHandle = null;

        this.start = function() {
            var thisObj = this;
            this.intervalHandle = A.interval(function(){
                if (thisObj) {
                    thisObj.updateCountdownText();
                }
            }, 1000);
        };

        this.stop = function() {
            if (this.intervalHandle) {
                window.clearInterval(this.intervalHandle);
            }
        };

        this.updateCountdownText = function() {
            this.secondsLeft --;
            if (this.secondsLeft > 0) {
                var remainMins = Math.floor(this.secondsLeft / 60);
                var minutes = remainMins % 60;
                var hours = Math.floor(remainMins / 60);
                var seconds = this.secondsLeft % 60;
                var hourString   = (hours > 1) ? strings.hours : strings.hour;
                var minuteString = (minutes > 1) ? strings.minutes : strings.minute;
                var secondString = (seconds > 1) ? strings.seconds : strings.second;
                var seperatorString = strings.timeSeperator;
                var andString = strings.and;
                var showTruncatedCountdown = "T2" == "T1";
                var truncatedCountdownInDays = Math.floor(hours / 24);
                var dayString = (truncatedCountdownInDays > 1) ? strings.days : strings.day;

                var countdownText;
                if (showTruncatedCountdown && truncatedCountdownInDays > 0) {
                    countdownText = truncatedCountdownInDays + seperatorString + dayString;
                }
                else if (hours > 0 && minutes > 0) {
                    if (showAndInCountDown) {
                        countdownText = hours + seperatorString + hourString + seperatorString + andString + seperatorString + minutes + seperatorString + minuteString;
                    } else {
                        countdownText = hours + seperatorString + hourString + seperatorString + minutes + seperatorString + minuteString;
                    }
                } else if ( hours > 0 && minutes == 0 ) {
                    countdownText = hours + seperatorString + hourString;
                } else if ( hours == 0 && minutes > 0 ) {
                    countdownText = minutes + seperatorString + minuteString;
                } else {
                    countdownText = seconds + seperatorString + secondString;
                }
                $(countdownElementId).html(countdownText);
            } else {
                this.stop();
                var refreshText = "<a href='/gp/product/"+asin+"'>"+strings.refreshTimeout+"</a>";
                $(shippingMessageSectionId).html(refreshText);
            }
        };
    };
});
</script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
/**
 * Component: used to control other features(buybox,mbc,miniAtf) for Ship By Region.
 */
P.when("A","jQuery","a-popover","cf").execute(function(A,$,popover) {
    window.registeredDDMSBRComponent || P.register("DDMShipByRegionComponent",function() {
        var mbcDataUrl = "/gp/product/features/dynamic-delivery-message/udp-ajax-handler/get-mbc-location-based-data.html?_encoding=UTF-8";
        var asin;
        var isMfn;
        var gotoTopElementId;
        var bbUndeliverableAlert;
        var undeliverableLabel;
        var mbcMerchantIds;
        var mbcOfferIsAgsFlags;
        var sbrBehavior = {
            onlySupportMfn: false,
            updateBuyBtnInBB: false,
            updateShipChargeForMfnInBB: false,
            updateAvailInBB: false,
            showUndeliverablePopInBB: false,
            updateBuyBtnInMBC: false,
            updateShipChargeForMfnInMBC: false,
            updateAvailInMBC: false,
            showUndeliverablePopInMBC: false,
            updateBuyBtnInMiniATF: false,
            updateAvailInMiniATF: false,
            reloadPageWhenBBWinnerChange: false,
            ignoreAgsOfferInMBC: false
        };
        var defaultMbcShipChargeText;
        
        var updateBuyBox = function(isDeliverable,shipChargeText) {
            if (sbrBehavior.onlySupportMfn && !isMfn) return;
        
            sbrBehavior.updateAvailInBB && updateAvailInBB(isDeliverable);
            sbrBehavior.updateShipChargeForMfnInBB && updateShipChargeForMfnInBB(shipChargeText);
            sbrBehavior.updateBuyBtnInBB && updateBuyBtnInBB(isDeliverable);
            sbrBehavior.showUndeliverablePopInBB && updateUndeliverablePopInBB(isDeliverable);
        };
        var updateAvailInBB = function(isDeliverable) {
            if (isDeliverable) {
                $("#soldByThirdParty").show();
            } else {
                $("#soldByThirdParty").hide();
            }
        };
        var updateShipChargeForMfnInBB = function(shipChargeText) {
            if (isMfn && shipChargeText) {
                $("#soldByThirdParty").find("span.shipping3P").html(shipChargeText);
            }
        };
        var updateBuyBtnInBB = function(isDeliverable) {
            $("#buybox\\.addToCart span.a-button-primary").unbind("click");
            $("#buyNow span.a-button-primary").unbind("click");
            if (isDeliverable) {
                // update UI
                $("#submit\\.add-to-cart").removeClass('a-button-disabled');//pc add to cart
                $("#buybox\\.addToCart span.a-button-primary").removeClass('a-button-disabled');//mobile add to cart
                $("#buyNow span.a-button-primary").removeClass('a-button-disabled'); // mobile buy now
                $("#oneClickAvailable span.a-button-oneclick").removeClass('a-button-disabled'); // all device one-click btn
                // enable input
                $("#add-to-cart-button").attr("disabled", false);
                $("#one-click-button").attr("disabled", false); // pc one-click
                $("#buyNow input.a-button-input").attr("disabled", false); // mobile buy now
                //TODO: add-on button
            } else {
                // update UI
                $("#submit\\.add-to-cart").addClass('a-button-disabled');//pc add to cart
                $("#buybox\\.addToCart span.a-button-primary").addClass('a-button-disabled');//mobile add to cart
                $("#buyNow span.a-button-primary").addClass('a-button-disabled'); // mobile buy now
                $("#oneClickAvailable span.a-button-oneclick").addClass('a-button-disabled');// all device one-click btn
                // disable input
                $("#add-to-cart-button").attr("disabled", true);
                $("#one-click-button").attr("disabled", true);
                $("#buyNow input.a-button-input").attr("disabled", true); // mobile buy now
                // disable click event for mobile
                $("#buybox\\.addToCart span.a-button-primary").bind("click",function(){
                    event.stopImmediatePropagation();
                });
                $("#buyNow span.a-button-primary").bind("click",function(){
                    event.stopImmediatePropagation();
                });
            }
        };
        var updateUndeliverablePopInBB = function(isDeliverable) {
            if (isDeliverable) {
                popover.remove($("#submit\\.add-to-cart"));
                popover.remove($("#oneClickAvailable span.a-button-oneclick"));
            } else {
                var content = "<span class='ddm-sbr-undeliverable-alert'>" + bbUndeliverableAlert + "</span>";
                popover.create($("#submit\\.add-to-cart"), {
                    "content": content,
                    "position": "triggerLeft",
                    "closeButton": false
                });
                popover.create($("#oneClickAvailable span.a-button-oneclick"), {
                    "content": content,
                    "position": "triggerLeft",
                    "closeButton": false
                });
            }
        };
        
        var updateMBC = function(address) {
            if (!mbcMerchantIds) return;
            initDefaultMbcShipChargeText();
            
            var mParas = [];
            mParas.push("asin=" + asin);
            address.zipCode && mParas.push("zipCode=" + address.zipCode);
            address.state && mParas.push("state=" + address.state);
            address.city && mParas.push("city=" + address.city);
            address.district && mParas.push("district=" + address.district);
            address.countryCode && mParas.push("countryCode=" + address.countryCode);
            address.useDefaultShippingAddress && mParas.push("useDefaultShippingAddress=" + address.useDefaultShippingAddress);
            
            var mbcElementCount = mbcMerchantIds.length;
            for (var i=1; i<= mbcElementCount; i++) {
                mParas.push("m" + i + "=" + mbcMerchantIds[i-1]);
            }

            if (mbcElementCount > 0) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: "POST",
                    url: mbcDataUrl,
                    contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
                    data: mParas.join('&'),
                    dataType: "json",
                    success: function(data){
                        var shipChargeElements = $("#mbc div.mbc-offer-row span.a-color-price ~ span");
                        var addToCartElements = $("#mbc div.mbc-offer-row span.a-button.a-button-primary");
                        var popoverElements = $("#mbc div.mbc-offer-row span.a-declarative");
                
                        if (data && data.infoList 
                                && data.infoList.length == mbcElementCount
                                && shipChargeElements && addToCartElements && popoverElements
                                && mbcElementCount == shipChargeElements.length
                                && mbcElementCount == addToCartElements.length
                                && mbcElementCount == popoverElements.length) {
                            for(var i = 0; i < mbcElementCount; i ++) {
                                var mbcItem = data.infoList[i];
                                var mid = mbcItem.merchantID;
                                if (mid && mid === mbcMerchantIds[i]
                                        && mbcItem.enableSBR
                                        && (!sbrBehavior.onlySupportMfn || mbcItem.isMfn)
                                        && !(sbrBehavior.ignoreAgsOfferInMBC
                                                && mbcOfferIsAgsFlags != null
                                                && mbcElementCount == mbcOfferIsAgsFlags.length
                                                && mbcOfferIsAgsFlags[i] === "1")) {

                                    // update ship charge
                                    if (sbrBehavior.updateShipChargeForMfnInMBC) {
                                        var shipChargeText = mbcItem.shipChargeText;
                                        if (mbcItem.isDeliverable) {
                                            shipChargeText = mbcItem.isMfn && shipChargeText ? shipChargeText : defaultMbcShipChargeText[mid];
                                        } else {
                                            shipChargeText = undeliverableLabel;
                                        }
                                        
                                        $(shipChargeElements[i]).html(shipChargeText);
                                    }
                                    
                                    // update buy button
                                    if (sbrBehavior.updateBuyBtnInMBC) {
                                        var $addToCartBtn = $(addToCartElements[i]);
                                        $addToCartBtn.find("a").unbind("click");
                                        if (mbcItem.isDeliverable) {
                                            $addToCartBtn.removeClass("a-button-disabled");
                                        } else {
                                            $addToCartBtn.addClass("a-button-disabled");
                                            $addToCartBtn.find("a").bind("click", function(event) {
                                                event.preventDefault();
                                            });
                                        }
                                    }
                                    
                                    // update popover
                                    if (sbrBehavior.showUndeliverablePopInMBC) {
                                        var $popoverTrigger = $(popoverElements[i]);
                                        var popoverParam = $popoverTrigger.attr("data-a-popover");
                                        if(popoverParam) {
                                            popover.remove($popoverTrigger);
                                            if (mbcItem.isDeliverable) {
                                               popoverParam = eval("[" + popoverParam + "]");
                                                popover.create($popoverTrigger, popoverParam[0]);
                                            } else {
                                               popover.create($popoverTrigger, {
                                                    "content" : "<span class='ddm-sbr-undeliverable-alert'>" + bbUndeliverableAlert + "</span>",
                                                    "position" : "triggerLeft",
                                                    "closeButton" : false
                                                });
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
            }
        };
        var initDefaultMbcShipChargeText = function() {
            if (!defaultMbcShipChargeText) {
                defaultMbcShipChargeText = {};
                var currentShipChargeText = $("#mbc div.mbc-offer-row span.a-color-price ~ span.a-color-secondary");
                
                if(currentShipChargeText && mbcMerchantIds && currentShipChargeText.length == mbcMerchantIds.length) {
                    for(var i=0; i < mbcMerchantIds.length; i++) {
                        defaultMbcShipChargeText[mbcMerchantIds[i]] = $(currentShipChargeText[i]).html();
                    }
                }
            }
        };
        
        var updateMiniAtf = function(isDeliverable,miniAvailText) {
            if (sbrBehavior.onlySupportMfn && !isMfn) return;

            if (miniAvailText) {
                A.delay(function(){
                    // update avail msg
                    if (sbrBehavior.updateAvailInMiniATF) {
                        $("#gTTLink div.availability-shipping span.scarcity").html(miniAvailText);
                        gotoTopElementId && $(gotoTopElementId).click(function(event){
                            jQuery("#gTTLink").slideUp();
                            jQuery("body,html").animate({scrollTop: 0}, 300);
                            event.stopImmediatePropagation();
                        });
                    }
                    // update buy button
                    if (sbrBehavior.updateBuyBtnInMiniATF) {
                        var $miniAtfBuyBtn = $("#gTTLink div.add-to-cart");
                        $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("span.a-button-primary a").unbind("click");
                        if (isDeliverable) {
                            $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("button.a-button-text").attr("disabled", false);
                            $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("span.a-button-primary").removeClass('a-button-disabled');
                        } else {
                            $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("button.a-button-text").attr("disabled", true);
                            $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("span.a-button-primary").addClass('a-button-disabled');
                            $miniAtfBuyBtn.find("span.a-button-primary a").bind("click",function(event){
                                event.preventDefault();
                            });
                        }
                    }
                },1500);
            }
        };
        
        return {
            init: function(ddmContext) {
                asin = ddmContext.asin;
                isMfn = ddmContext.isMfn;
                bbUndeliverableAlert = ddmContext.strings.bbUndeliverableAlert;
                undeliverableLabel = ddmContext.strings.undeliverableLabel;
                gotoTopElementId = ddmContext.sbrContext.gotoTopElementId;
                mbcMerchantIds = ddmContext.sbrContext.mbcMerchantIds;
                mbcOfferIsAgsFlags = ddmContext.sbrContext.mbcOfferIsAgsFlags;
                sbrBehavior = ddmContext.sbrContext.sbrBehavior ? ddmContext.sbrContext.sbrBehavior : sbrBehavior;
                defaultMbcShipChargeText = null;
            },
            updateSBRRelevant: function(selectedAddress,isDeliverable,enableSBR,shipChargeText,miniAvailText,isbbWinnerChanged) {
                if (!enableSBR) return;
                if (sbrBehavior.reloadPageWhenBBWinnerChange && isbbWinnerChanged) {
                    var url = window.location.toString();
                    url = url.split('#')[0];
                    window.location.href = url;
                } else {
                    updateBuyBox(isDeliverable, shipChargeText);
                    updateMBC(selectedAddress);
                    updateMiniAtf(isDeliverable,miniAvailText);
                }
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredDDMSBRComponent = true;
});
</script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A","jQuery","a-popover","DDMShipByRegionComponent","cf").execute(function(A,$,popover,sbrComp){
    window.registeredDDMAddressSelect || P.register("DDMAddressSelectComponent",function() {
        var addressSelectHandler;
        return {
            init: function(ddmContext,countdownComp) {
                addressSelectHandler && addressSelectHandler.destroy();
                (addressSelectHandler = new CNAddressSelectHandler(ddmContext,countdownComp,sbrComp)).init();
            },
            reload: function() {
                addressSelectHandler.reloadDeliveryMessage();
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredDDMAddressSelect = true;
    /***********************************************
    * Function: used to control the address select work flow
    ***********************************************/
    function CNAddressSelectHandler(ddmContext,countdownComp,sbrComp) {
        var isInit = false;
        var myAddressComponent;
        var customerAddressComponent;
        var scdRegionComponet;
        var quantityComponent;
        var oneClickAddressComponent;
        var isDDSStyle = ddmContext.isDDSStyle;
        var isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress = ddmContext.isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress;
        var selectedState = ddmContext.selectedState;
        var selectedCity = ddmContext.selectedCity;
        var selectedDistrict = ddmContext.selectedDistrict;
        var isMunicipality = ddmContext.isMunicipality;
        var selectedAddressText = ddmContext.selectedAddressText;
        var bbWinnerMerchantId = ddmContext.merchantId;
        var selectedQuantity = 1;
        var addrPopoverParam = ddmContext.addressPopover;
        var sbrContext = ddmContext.sbrContext;
        var strings = ddmContext.strings;
        var updateDeliveryMessageUrl = "/gp/product/features/dynamic-delivery-message/udp-ajax-handler/get-delivery-message.html?_encoding=UTF-8";
        this.init = function () {
            if (!isInit) {
                isInit = true;
                initMyAddressComponent();
                initCustomerAddressComponent();
                initSCDRegionComponent();
                initOpOnShowAddressPopover();
                initQuantityComponent();
                initShipByRegionComponent();
                initOneClickAddressComponent();
            }
        };
        this.reloadDeliveryMessage = function() {
            $("#ddmSelectedAddressText").html(getLastestSelectedAddressText());
            updateDeliveryMessage(0,"","","",0,1,true,true);
        };
        this.destroy = function() {
            myAddressComponent.destroy();
            customerAddressComponent.destroy();
            scdRegionComponet.destroy();
            quantityComponent.destroy();
            oneClickAddressComponent.destroy();
            $(document).undelegate(addrPopoverParam.triggerId, "click");
        };
        var initMyAddressComponent = function() {
            myAddressComponent = new CNMyAddressComponent();
            myAddressComponent.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district) {
                scdRegionComponet.reset(new Array(null,null,null));
                updateDeliveryMessage(1,state,city,district,1,quantityComponent.quantity,false,false);
            };
        };
        var initCustomerAddressComponent = function() {
            customerAddressComponent = new CNCustomerAddressComponent();
            customerAddressComponent.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district) {
                scdRegionComponet.reset(new Array(null,null,null));
                updateDeliveryMessage(1,state,city,district,0,quantityComponent.quantity,false,false);
            };
        };
        var initSCDRegionComponent = function() {
            scdRegionComponet = new CNSCDRegionGroupComponent(addrPopoverParam.maxRegionTdSpan,
                    addrPopoverParam.classRegionTriggerSelect,addrPopoverParam.classRegionTriggerDisable,
                    isMunicipality,selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict,
                    strings.plsSelectState,strings.plsSelectCity,strings.plsSelectDistrict);
            scdRegionComponet.afterRegionSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district) {
                updateDeliveryMessage(1,state,city,district,0,quantityComponent.quantity,true,false);
            };
        };
        var initOpOnShowAddressPopover = function() {
            $(document).delegate(addrPopoverParam.triggerId, "click", function(event){
                addrPopoverParam.prefetchRegion && scdRegionComponet.prefetchRegion();
                resetAddressNoteText();
            });
            // fix issue: andoriod note2 can not be auto-resized for fixed div when "orientationchange"
            $(window).bind("orientationchange", function(event){
                A.delay(function(){
                    $("#ddmDestinationBar").html($("#ddmDestinationBar").html());
                    // update region list(column will be changed) when orientation is changed
                    scdRegionComponet.reShowRegionList();
                },500);
            });
        };
        var initQuantityComponent = function() {
            quantityComponent = new CNQuantityComponent();
            quantityComponent.quantityChangeDelegator = function() {
                updateDeliveryMessage(0,
                   selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict,
                   isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress,
                   quantityComponent.quantity,true,true);
            };
        };
        var initShipByRegionComponent = function() {
            sbrComp.init(ddmContext);
            sbrComp.updateSBRRelevant(
                    {state:selectedState, city:selectedCity, district:selectedDistrict,
                     useDefaultShippingAddress:isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress},
                    ddmContext.isDeliverable,sbrContext.enableSBR,sbrContext.shipChargeText,
                    sbrContext.miniAvailText,false);
        };
        var initOneClickAddressComponent = function() {
            oneClickAddressComponent = new CNOneClickAddressComponent();
            oneClickAddressComponent.addressChangeDelegator = function(state,city,district) {
                updateDeliveryMessage(1,state,city,district,0,quantityComponent.quantity,true,true);
            };
        }
        var resetAddressNoteText = function() {
            if (isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress == 1) {
                $("#ddmSelectedStateText").html(strings.defaultShippingAddress);
                $("#ddmSelectedCityText").html("");
                $("#ddmSelectedDistrictText").html("");
            } else {
                $("#ddmSelectedStateText").html(selectedState);
                $("#ddmSelectedCityText").html(selectedCity);
                $("#ddmSelectedDistrictText").html(selectedDistrict);
            }
        }
        var setLastestSelectedAddressText = function(addressText) {
            var ddmPageStateData = A.state("ddmPageStateData");
            ddmPageStateData.selectedAddressText = addressText;
            A.state("ddmPageStateData",ddmPageStateData);
        };
        var getLastestSelectedAddressText = function() {
            var ddmPageStateData = A.state("ddmPageStateData");
            return ddmPageStateData.selectedAddressText;
        };
        var closeAddressPopover = function() {
            var popoverName = ddmContext.addressPopover.name;
            var popoverType = ddmContext.addressPopover.type;
            if (popoverType == "a-secondary-view") {
                P.when("a-secondary-view").execute(function(secondaryView){
                    secondaryView.get(popoverName) && secondaryView.get(popoverName).hide();
                });
            } else if (popoverType == "a-modal") {
                P.when("a-modal").execute(function(modalView){
                    modalView.get(popoverName) && modalView.get(popoverName).hide();
                });
            } else {
                popover.get(popoverName) && popover.get(popoverName).hide();
            }
        };
        var updateDeliveryMessage = function(updateSembu,state,city,district,useDefaultShippingAddress,quantity,reloadCustAddrList,resetSCDRegionValue) {
            closeAddressPopover();
            if (useDefaultShippingAddress == isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress 
               && state == selectedState && city == selectedCity 
               && district == selectedDistrict && quantity == selectedQuantity) return;
            countdownComp.stop();
            
            var canReload = sbrContext.sbrBehavior && sbrContext.sbrBehavior.reloadPageWhenBBWinnerChange;
            $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: updateDeliveryMessageUrl,
                contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
                data: {"deviceType":ddmContext.deviceType,"asin":ddmContext.asin,
                       "preselectedMerchantId":(canReload ? ddmContext.preselectedMerchantId : ""),
                       "merchantId":(canReload ? "" : ddmContext.merchantId),
                       "updateSembu":updateSembu,
                       "state":state,"city":city,"district":district,
                       "useDefaultShippingAddress":useDefaultShippingAddress,
                       "quantity":quantity},
                dataType: "json",
                success: function(data){
                    selectedQuantity = quantity;
                    isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress = data.useDefaultShippingAddress;
                    selectedState = data.selectedState;
                    selectedCity = data.selectedCity;
                    selectedDistrict = data.selectedDistrict;
                    selectedAddressText = (isDDSStyle && isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress == 1) ? data.strDefaultShippingAddress : data.selectedAddressText;
                    var isbbWinnerChanged = (bbWinnerMerchantId != data.merchantID);
                    bbWinnerMerchantId = data.merchantID;
                    
                    $("#ddmSelectedAddressText").html(selectedAddressText);
                    $("#ddmAvailabilityMessage").html(data.availabilityMessage);
                    $("#ddmAvailabilityNotes").html(data.availabilityNotes);
                    $("#ddmFastShippingMessage").html(data.fastShippingMessage);
                    $("#ddmCheapShippingMessage").html(data.cheapShippingMessage);
                    $("#ddmSelfPickUpMessage").html(data.selfPickUpMessage);
                    $("#ddmPreciseDeliveryTimeTip").html(data.preciseDeliveryTimeTip);
                    if (data.isDeliverable && data.isInStock) {
                        countdownComp.start(data.fastSecondsLeftToOrder,data.cheapSecondsLeftToOrder);
                        $("#ddmShippingMessage").removeClass("a-hidden");
                    } else {
                        $("#ddmShippingMessage").addClass("a-hidden");
                    }
                    resetAddressNoteText();
                    setLastestSelectedAddressText(selectedAddressText);
                    reloadCustAddrList && customerAddressComponent.updateList(data.customerAddressList);
                    resetSCDRegionValue && scdRegionComponet.reset(new Array(selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict));
                    sbrComp.updateSBRRelevant(
                        {state:selectedState, city:selectedCity, district:selectedDistrict,
                         useDefaultShippingAddress:isSelectedDefaultShippingAddress},
                        data.isDeliverable,data.enableSBR,data.shipChargeText,
                        data.miniAvailText,isbbWinnerChanged);
                },
                error: function(){
                    $("#dynamicDeliveryMessage").replaceWith(strings.serverBusy);
                }
            });
        };
    };
    
    /***********************************************
     * Function: my address component including default shipping address
     ***********************************************/
    function CNMyAddressComponent() {
        this.myAddressNode = this.myAddressSectionId + " ul";
        this.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district){};
        var thisObj = this;
        $(this.myAddressNode).delegate("li", "click", function(event){
            thisObj.whenClickAddressItem(this);
        });
        $(this.myAddressNode).delegate("li", "mouseenter", function(event){
            $(this).addClass("a-active");
        });
        $(this.myAddressNode).delegate("li", "mouseout", function(event){
            $(this).removeClass("a-active");
        });
    }
    CNMyAddressComponent.prototype.myAddressSectionId = "#ddmMyAddressSection";
    CNMyAddressComponent.prototype.whenClickAddressItem = function(target) {
        var selectedAddress = eval($(target).attr("address-data"));
        this.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator(selectedAddress[0].state,
                                             selectedAddress[0].city,
                                             selectedAddress[0].district);
    };
    CNMyAddressComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        $(this.myAddressSectionId).undelegate("li");
    };
    /***********************************************
     * Function: customer address component
     ***********************************************/
    function CNCustomerAddressComponent() {
        this.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district){};
        
        var thisObj = this;
        $(this.customerAddressListNode).delegate("li", "click", function(event){
            thisObj.whenClickAddressItem(this);
        });
        $(this.customerAddressListNode).delegate("li", "mouseenter", function(event){
            $(this).addClass("a-active");
        });
        $(this.customerAddressListNode).delegate("li", "mouseout", function(event){
            $(this).removeClass("a-active");
        });
    }
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.customerAddressSectionId = "#ddmCustomerAddressSection";
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.customerAddressListNode = "#ddmCustomerAddressSection ul";
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.orSelectDividerSectionId = "#ddmOrSelectDivider";
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.whenClickAddressItem = function(target) {
        var selectedAddress = eval($(target).attr("address-data"));
        this.afterAddressItemSelectDelegator(selectedAddress[0].state,selectedAddress[0].city,selectedAddress[0].district);
    };
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.updateList = function(customerAddressListJson) {
        var customerAddressList = eval(customerAddressListJson);
           if (customerAddressList && customerAddressList.length > 0) {
               var listItemsHtml = "";
               var $listItemTemplate = $(this.customerAddressListNode).find("li").first();
               var listItemTemplateHtml = $listItemTemplate.html();
               var listItemTemplateText = $.trim($listItemTemplate.text());
               for (var i = 0; i < customerAddressList.length; i ++) {
                   var state = customerAddressList[i].state;
                   var city = customerAddressList[i].city;
                   var district = customerAddressList[i].district;
                   if (state && city && district) {
                       var addressData = "[{state:'" + state + "',city:'" + city + "',district:'" + district + "'}]";
                       var addressText = (city == district) ? (state + city) : (city + district);
                       listItemsHtml += "<li address-data=\"" + addressData + "\">" + listItemTemplateHtml.replace(listItemTemplateText,addressText) + "</li>";
                   }
               }
               if (listItemsHtml != "") {
                   $(this.customerAddressListNode).html(listItemsHtml);
                   $(this.customerAddressSectionId).removeClass("a-hidden");
                   $(this.orSelectDividerSectionId).removeClass("a-hidden");
               }
           } else {
               $(this.customerAddressSectionId).addClass("a-hidden");
           }
    };
    CNCustomerAddressComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        $(this.customerAddressListNode).undelegate("li");
    };
    
    /***********************************************
     * Function: the region group component
     ***********************************************/
    function CNSCDRegionGroupComponent(maxRegionTdSpan,
            classRegionTriggerSelect,classRegionTriggerDisable,
            isMunicipality,selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict,
            strSelectState,strSelectCity,strSelectDistrict) {
        this.maxRegionTdSpan = maxRegionTdSpan;
        this.classRegionTriggerSelect = classRegionTriggerSelect;
        this.classRegionTriggerDisable = classRegionTriggerDisable;
        this.regionDataProvider = new CNRegionDataProvider();
        this.regionCompArr = null;
        this.afterRegionSelectDelegator = function(state,city,district){};

        this.initSCDRegion(isMunicipality,selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict,
                strSelectState,strSelectCity,strSelectDistrict);
    }
    CNSCDRegionGroupComponent.prototype.initSCDRegion = function(isMunicipality,selectedState,selectedCity,selectedDistrict,
            strSelectState,strSelectCity,strSelectDistrict) {
        var thisObj = this;
        var completeSelectCallback = function(regionValueArr){
            thisObj.afterRegionSelectDelegator(regionValueArr[0],regionValueArr[1],regionValueArr[2]);
        };
        var stateComponent  = new CNRegionComponent(this.maxRegionTdSpan,this.classRegionTriggerSelect,this.classRegionTriggerDisable,
                "#ddmStateTriggerText","#ddmStateTriggerId","#ddmStateListWrapper","#ddmSelectedStateText",
                true,selectedState,strSelectState,this.regionDataProvider,null);
        var cityComponent  = new CNRegionComponent(this.maxRegionTdSpan,this.classRegionTriggerSelect,this.classRegionTriggerDisable,
                "#ddmCityTriggerText","#ddmCityTriggerId","#ddmCityListWrapper","#ddmSelectedCityText",
                !isMunicipality,selectedCity,strSelectCity,this.regionDataProvider,null);
        var districtComponent  = new CNRegionComponent(this.maxRegionTdSpan,this.classRegionTriggerSelect,this.classRegionTriggerDisable,
                "#ddmDistrictTriggerText","#ddmDistrictTriggerId","#ddmDistrictListWrapper","#ddmSelectedDistrictText",
                true,selectedDistrict,strSelectDistrict,this.regionDataProvider,completeSelectCallback);
       this.regionCompArr = new Array(stateComponent,cityComponent,districtComponent);
       for (var i = 0; i < this.regionCompArr.length; i ++) {
           this.regionCompArr[i].preRegion = (i > 0) ? this.regionCompArr[i-1] : null;
           this.regionCompArr[i].nextRegion = (i < this.regionCompArr.length - 1) ? this.regionCompArr[i+1] : null;
       }
    };
    CNSCDRegionGroupComponent.prototype.prefetchRegion = function() {
        this.regionCompArr[0].whenClickRegionTrigger();
    };
    CNSCDRegionGroupComponent.prototype.reShowRegionList = function() {
        for (var i = 0; i < this.regionCompArr.length; i ++) {
            var regionComp = this.regionCompArr[i];
            if (regionComp && regionComp.getIsRegionListShown()) {
                regionComp.reShowRegionList();
                break;
            }
        }
    };
    CNSCDRegionGroupComponent.prototype.reset = function(valueArray) {
        for (var i = 0; i < this.regionCompArr.length; i ++) {
            this.regionCompArr[i].updateRegionValue(valueArray[i]);
            this.regionCompArr[i].unHighlightRegionTrigger();
            this.regionCompArr[i].hideRegionList();
        }
    };
    CNSCDRegionGroupComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        for (var i = 0; i < this.regionCompArr.length; i ++) {
            this.regionCompArr[i].destroy();
        }
    };
    
    /***********************************************
     * Function: the region component
     ***********************************************/
    function CNRegionComponent(maxRegionTdSpan,classRegionTriggerSelect,classRegionTriggerDisable,
            regionTriggerTextId,regionTriggerId,regionListWrapperId,regionNameTextId,
            regionTriggerEnabled,regionValue,regionLabel,regionDataProvider,completeSelectCallback) {
        this.maxRegionTdSpan = maxRegionTdSpan;
        this.classRegionTriggerSelect = classRegionTriggerSelect;
        this.classRegionTriggerDisable = classRegionTriggerDisable;
        this.regionTriggerTextId = regionTriggerTextId;
        this.regionTriggerId = regionTriggerId;
        this.regionListWrapperId = regionListWrapperId;
        this.regionNameTextId = regionNameTextId;
        this.regionLabel = regionLabel;
        this.regionValue = regionValue;
        this.regionDataProvider = regionDataProvider;
        this.completeSelectCallback = completeSelectCallback;
        this.preRegion = null;
        this.nextRegion = null;
        this.curRegionArray = null;
        this.isRegionListShown = false;

        var thisObj = this;
        $(document).delegate(this.regionTriggerId, "click", function(event){
            thisObj.whenClickRegionTrigger();
        });
        
        this.updateRegionTriggerStatus(regionTriggerEnabled);
    }
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.spinnerHtml = '<div class="a-popover-loading-wrapper a-text-center"><div class="a-box a-color-base-background a-popover-loading"></div></div>';
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.getPreSiblingsValue = function() {
        var preSiblingValues = new Array();
        var validValue = true;
        var regionComp = this;
        while(regionComp = regionComp.preRegion) {
            if (!regionComp.regionValue) {
                validValue = false;
                break;
            }
            preSiblingValues.unshift(regionComp.regionValue);
        }
        return validValue ? preSiblingValues : null;
    }
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.updateRegionValue = function(value) {
        this.regionValue = value;
        $(this.regionTriggerTextId).text((value) ? value : this.regionLabel);
        $(this.regionNameTextId).text((value) ? value : "");
        this.regionValue || this.updateNextSiblingsTriggerStatus(false);
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.refreshPreSiblingsValue = function() {
        var regionComp = this;
        while (regionComp = regionComp.preRegion) {
            regionComp.updateRegionValue(regionComp.regionValue);
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.updateNextSiblingsValueToNull = function() {
        var regionComp = this;
        while (regionComp = regionComp.nextRegion) {
            regionComp.updateRegionValue(null);
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.updateRegionTriggerStatus = function(enable) {
        if (enable) {
            $(this.regionTriggerId).removeClass(this.classRegionTriggerDisable);
        } else {
            $(this.regionTriggerId).addClass(this.classRegionTriggerDisable);
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.updateNextSiblingsTriggerStatus = function(enable) {
        var regionComp = this;
        while (regionComp = regionComp.nextRegion) {
            regionComp.updateRegionTriggerStatus(enable);
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.highlightRegionTrigger = function() {
        $(this.regionTriggerId).addClass(this.classRegionTriggerSelect);
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.unHighlightRegionTrigger = function() {
        $(this.regionTriggerId).removeClass(this.classRegionTriggerSelect);
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.unHighlightSiblingsTrigger = function() {
        var regionComp = this;
        while(regionComp = regionComp.preRegion) {
            regionComp.unHighlightRegionTrigger();
        }
        regionComp = this;
        while(regionComp = regionComp.nextRegion) {
            regionComp.unHighlightRegionTrigger();
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.getIsRegionListShown = function() {
        return this.isRegionListShown;
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.reShowRegionList = function() {
        this.curRegionArray && this.showRegionList(this.curRegionArray);
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.showRegionList = function(regionArray) {
        this.curRegionArray = regionArray;
        // Move long names to the end of the list
        for (var i = 0; i < regionArray.length-1; ++i) {
            for (var j = i+1; j< regionArray.length; ++j) {
                if (regionArray[i].length > regionArray[j].length) {
                    var temp = regionArray[i];
                    regionArray[i] = regionArray[j];
                    regionArray[j] = temp;
                }
            }
        }
        var popoverWidth = $(this.regionListWrapperId).parents(".a-popover").width();
        var maxColCount = popoverWidth > 660 ? 6 : 4;
        var tableInnerHtml = "<table>";
        var dataLength = regionArray.length;
        var i = 0;
        var isEvenRow = false;
        while(i < dataLength) {
            tableInnerHtml += (isEvenRow) ? "<tr class='ddm-region-table-even-row'>" : "<tr>";
            var colSpanCount = 0;
            while (i < dataLength) {
                var regionItemValue = regionArray[i];
                var regionItemClass = (regionItemValue == this.regionValue) ? "ddm-region-item-selected" : "";
                var valueLength = regionItemValue.length;
                // determine the col span of current region text
                var colSpan = 1;
                while (valueLength > this.maxRegionTdSpan*colSpan) {
                    colSpan = colSpan * 2;
                }
                colSpan = colSpan > maxColCount ? maxColCount : colSpan;

                // generate tds
                if (colSpanCount + colSpan > maxColCount) {
                    (colSpanCount < maxColCount) && (tableInnerHtml += "<td colSpan='" + (maxColCount-colSpanCount) + "'></td>");
                    break;
                } else {
                    if (colSpanCount == 1 && colSpan > 1) {
                        tableInnerHtml += "<td></td>";
                        colSpanCount ++;
                    }
                    tableInnerHtml += "<td colSpan='" + colSpan + "'><a href='javascript:;' class='"+regionItemClass+"'>" + regionItemValue + "</a></td>";
                    colSpanCount += colSpan;
                    (i == (dataLength-1) && colSpanCount < maxColCount) && (tableInnerHtml += "<td colSpan='" + (maxColCount-colSpanCount) + "'></td>");
                    i ++;
                }
            }
            tableInnerHtml += "</tr>";
            isEvenRow = !isEvenRow;
        }
        tableInnerHtml += "</table>";
        $(this.regionListWrapperId).html(tableInnerHtml);
        // flag
        this.isRegionListShown = true;
        
        var thisObj = this;
        $(this.regionListWrapperId + " table a").click(function(event){
            thisObj.whenClickRegionListItem($(this).text());
            event.stopImmediatePropagation();
        });
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.hideRegionList = function() {
        $(this.regionListWrapperId).html("");
        // flag
        this.isRegionListShown = false;
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.hideSiblingsRegionList = function() {
        var regionComp = this;
        while(regionComp = regionComp.preRegion) {
            regionComp.hideRegionList();
        }
        regionComp = this;
        while(regionComp = regionComp.nextRegion) {
            regionComp.hideRegionList();
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.whenClickRegionTrigger = function() {
        var thisObj = this;
        var preSiblingValues = this.getPreSiblingsValue();
        if (preSiblingValues) {
            $(this.regionListWrapperId).html(this.spinnerHtml);
            this.regionDataProvider.getRegionArray(preSiblingValues,function(regionItemArray){
                $(thisObj.regionListWrapperId).html("");
                if (regionItemArray && regionItemArray.length > 0) {
                    if (regionItemArray.length == 1) {
                        thisObj.updateRegionTriggerStatus(false);
                        thisObj.whenClickRegionListItem(regionItemArray[0]);
                    } else {
                        thisObj.updateRegionTriggerStatus(true);
                        thisObj.highlightRegionTrigger();
                        thisObj.showRegionList(regionItemArray);
                        thisObj.unHighlightSiblingsTrigger();
                        thisObj.hideSiblingsRegionList();
                    }
                }
            })
        }
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.whenClickRegionListItem = function(regionItemText) {
        this.updateRegionValue(regionItemText);
        this.refreshPreSiblingsValue();
        this.updateNextSiblingsValueToNull();
        this.unHighlightRegionTrigger();
        this.hideRegionList();
        if (this.nextRegion) {
            this.nextRegion.whenClickRegionTrigger();
        } else {
            var regionValueArr = this.getPreSiblingsValue();
            if (regionValueArr) {
                regionValueArr.push(this.regionValue);
                this.completeSelectCallback(regionValueArr);
            }
        }
        
    };
    CNRegionComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        $(document).undelegate(this.regionTriggerId, "click");
    };
    
    /***********************************************
     * Function: used to handle the CN region data(state,city,district)
    ***********************************************/
    function CNRegionDataProvider() {
        var regionDataUrl = "/gp/product/features/dynamic-delivery-message/udp-ajax-handler/get-cn-region-data.html";
        var regionJsonData = null;
        this.getRegionArray = function(regionValueArr,callback) {
            loadData(function(data){
                var regionArray = null;
                if (data) {
                    var regionJson = data;
                    for (var i = 0; i < regionValueArr.length; i ++) {
                        if (regionValueArr[i]) {
                            regionJson = findChildren(regionJson, regionValueArr[i]);
                        } else {
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    regionArray = convertJsonFirstLevelToArray(regionJson);
                }
                callback(regionArray);
            });
        }
        var loadData = function(callback) {
            if (!regionJsonData) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: "GET",
                    url: regionDataUrl,
                    dataType: "json",
                    success: function(data){
                        regionJsonData = data;
                        callback && callback(regionJsonData);
                    },
                    error: function(){
                        callback && callback(null);
                    }
                });
            } else {
                callback && callback(regionJsonData);
            }
        };
        var findChildren = function(json, name) {
            for (var i = 0; i < json.length; i++) {
                if (json[i][name]) {
                    return json[i][name];
                }
            }
            return null;
        };

        var convertJsonFirstLevelToArray = function(json) {
            var array = new Array();
            for (var i = 0; i < json.length; i++) {
                if (typeof(json[i]) == "string") {
                    array[i] = json[i];
                } else {
                    for (var item in json[i]) {
                        array[i] = item;
                    }
                }
            }
            return array;
        };
    }
    /***********************************************
     * Function: quantity component
     ***********************************************/
    function CNQuantityComponent() {
        this.quantity = 1;
        
        this.quantityChangeDelegator = function(){};
        
        var thisObj = this;
        $(document).delegate(this.quantityId, "change", function(event){
            thisObj.updateQuantity($(this).val());
        });
    }
    CNQuantityComponent.prototype.quantityId = '#selectQuantity [name="quantity"]';
    CNQuantityComponent.prototype.updateQuantity = function(value) {
        this.quantity = value;
        this.quantityChangeDelegator();
    };
    CNQuantityComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        $(document).undelegate(this.quantityId, "change");
    };
    /***********************************************
     * Function: 1click address component
     ***********************************************/
    function CNOneClickAddressComponent() {
        this.addressChangeDelegator = function(state,city,district){};
        this.getAddressInfoByIdUrl = "/gp/product/features/dynamic-delivery-message/udp-ajax-handler/get-address-info-by-id.html";

        var thisObj = this;
        $(document).delegate(this.dropdownId, "change", function(event){
            thisObj.updateOneClickAddress($(this).val());
        });
    }
    CNOneClickAddressComponent.prototype.dropdownId = '#shipTo, #buyboxAddressSelectionDropDown';
    CNOneClickAddressComponent.prototype.updateOneClickAddress = function(addressId) {
        if (addressId === 'add-new') {
            return;
        }

        var thisObj = this;
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: this.getAddressInfoByIdUrl,
            contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
            data: {"addressId": addressId},
            dataType: "json",
            success: function(address) {
                if (address && address.state && address.city && address.district) {
                    thisObj.addressChangeDelegator(address.state, address.city, address.district);
                }
            }
        });
    };
    CNOneClickAddressComponent.prototype.destroy = function() {
        $(document).undelegate(this.addressId, "change");
    };
});
</script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
/**
 * Component: used to create fba popover
 */
P.when("A","jQuery","a-popover","cf").execute(function(A,$,popover) {
    window.registeredDDMFbaPopup || P.register("DDMFbaPopupComponent",function() {
        var popoverAttr = {
                "name": "",
                "header":"",
                "position": "triggerBottom",
                "closeButton": true,
                "width": "400",
                "activate": "onclick"
        };
        return {
            init: function(ddmContext) {
                popoverAttr.name = ddmContext.ssofPopover.name;
                popoverAttr.header = ddmContext.ssofPopover.header;
                popover.create($(ddmContext.ssofPopover.triggerId),popoverAttr);
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredDDMFbaPopup = true;
});
</script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A","jQuery","cf").execute(function(A,$){
    window.registeredDDMTwisterHandler || P.register("DDMTwisterHandlerComponent",function() {
        return {
            init: function(ddmContext,addressSelectComp){
                var asin = ddmContext.asin;
                var ddmPageStateData = A.state("ddmPageStateData");
                var visitedAsins = ddmPageStateData ? ddmPageStateData.visitedAsins : null;
                if (visitedAsins) {
                    var isVisited = false;
                    var i = visitedAsins.length;
                    while (i--) {
                        if (visitedAsins[i] == asin) {
                            isVisited = true;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    if (isVisited) {
                        addressSelectComp.reload();
                    } else {
                        visitedAsins.push(asin);
                        ddmPageStateData.visitedAsins = visitedAsins;
                        A.state("ddmPageStateData",ddmPageStateData);
                    }
                }
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredDDMTwisterHandler = true;
});
</script>

                    <script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A","DDMCountdownComponent","DDMAddressSelectComponent","DDMFbaPopupComponent","DDMTwisterHandlerComponent").execute(
    function(A,countdownComp,addrSelectComp,fbaPopupComp,twisterHandlerComp) {
        window.registeredDDMController || P.register("DDMControllerComponent",function() {
            return {
                run: function(ddmContext) {
                    A.state("ddmPageStateData") || A.state("ddmPageStateData",{
                        visitedAsins: [],
                        selectedAddressText: ddmContext.selectedAddressText
                    });

                    countdownComp.init(ddmContext);
                    countdownComp.start(ddmContext.fastSecondsLeftToOrder,ddmContext.cheapSecondsLeftToOrder);

                    ddmContext.canSelectAddress && addrSelectComp.init(ddmContext,countdownComp);
                    
                    ddmContext.ssofPopover && ddmContext.ssofPopover.show && fbaPopupComp.init(ddmContext);
                    
                    ddmContext.canSelectAddress && twisterHandlerComp.init(ddmContext,addrSelectComp);
                }
            };
        });
        window.registeredDDMController = true;
    }
);
</script>

    <div id="heroQuickPromo_feature_div" class="feature" data-feature-name="heroQuickPromo">




    

    
    
    
        
        
        
        
        
        
    <div id="hero-quick-promo" class="a-row a-spacing-medium">
        
            <hr class="a-spacing-medium a-divider-normal">
        <!--wlhqp-->
  <div class="qpImage">
    <a href="/s/ref=amb_link_1?ie=UTF8&rh=n%3A1881293071%2Ci%3Astripbooks&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_s=hero-quick-promo&pf_rd_r=MN4VGK1N662QKSAK29W7&pf_rd_r=MN4VGK1N662QKSAK29W7&pf_rd_t=201&pf_rd_p=ee0a4881-eab1-452d-b718-a0d8e6705ffa&pf_rd_p=ee0a4881-eab1-452d-b718-a0d8e6705ffa&pf_rd_i=B073L91FTR">
        <img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/yingying/zad_170708_other_75x75_book._SS75_CB504616467_.jpg" width="75" align="left" alt="中文图书全场,满99元赠畅销书" height="75" border="0" />

  </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
P.register("DynamicIframe", function(){

function DynamicIframe(options) {
  
  var nTries = 0,
      MAX_TRIES = 20,
      iframeId = options.iframeId,
      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,
      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,
      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,
      iframeCSSId = "dynamic_iframe_CSS";
      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;
    
  this.createIframe = function() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling = "no";
    iframe.frameBorder = "0";
    onloadFn = this.iframeload;
    
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    
    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';
    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    
    var overriddenCSS = "";
    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {
    	overriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;
    }
    
    var doc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      doc.open();

      doc.writeln('<html><head><base target="_top" /></' + 'head><body><style class="text/css">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id="iframeContent" dir="auto">' + 
              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');
      doc.close();
    }
  }
  
  this.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    setTimeout(function () {
      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);
    }, 20); 
  }
  
  function getDocHeight(doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("iframeContent");
    var docHeight = 0;
    if(contentDiv){
      docHeight = Math.max(
        contentDiv.scrollHeight,
        contentDiv.offsetHeight,
        contentDiv.clientHeight
      );
    }
    return docHeight;
  }
  
  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {
    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
    iframeDoc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';
        if(typeof resizeCallback == "function") {
          resizeCallback(iframeId);	
        }
      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
        nTries++;
        setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
        }, 50);
      }
    }
  }
  
  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {
    nTries = 0;
	setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);
  }
}

return DynamicIframe;
});
</script>

	                
                
            
        
        
        
        
        
        
    
    
    

    















    </div>






        
    
        
        

        









    <div id="bookDescription_feature_div" class="feature" data-feature-name="bookDescription">

}
</script>


    
    
        
    



 <noscript>
 	<div> 本书完整收录老舍40年76篇散文经典，特选10篇以上少见篇目。<br>有游记闲谈，有小品文论，有日记书信，或说景或写物或谈人或论事，无一不有情、有趣。<br>老舍是公认的幽默大师、语言大师。他的文字至真至纯，语言俗白生动。字里行间透着质朴的天真和入世的睿智，又有入木三分的辛辣讽刺，饱含对生活的思考，读来暖心治愈，不忍释卷。<br><br>海报：<br><br><img src=https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/BOOK-Catalog/content/AC4IB_B073L91FTR_0001_20170717.jpg></div>

      <div id="bookDesc_iframe_wrapper" class="maxReadableWidth"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
 
P.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){
	var BookDescriptionIframe = null,
	    bookDescEncodedData = "%E6%9C%AC%E4%B9%A6%E5%AE%8C%E6%95%B4%E6%94%B6%E5%BD%95%E8%80%81%E8%88%8D40%E5%B9%B476%E7%AF%87%E6%95%A3%E6%96%87%E7%BB%8F%E5%85%B8%EF%BC%8C%E7%89%B9%E9%80%8910%E7%AF%87%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E5%B0%91%E8%A7%81%E7%AF%87%E7%9B%AE%E3%80%82%3Cbr%3E%E6%9C%89%E6%B8%B8%E8%AE%B0%E9%97%B2%E8%B0%88%EF%BC%8C%E6%9C%89%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%81%E6%96%87%E8%AE%BA%EF%BC%8C%E6%9C%89%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%E4%B9%A6%E4%BF%A1%EF%BC%8C%E6%88%96%E8%AF%B4%E6%99%AF%E6%88%96%E5%86%99%E7%89%A9%E6%88%96%E8%B0%88%E4%BA%BA%E6%88%96%E8%AE%BA%E4%BA%8B%EF%BC%8C%E6%97%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%8D%E6%9C%89%E6%83%85%E3%80%81%E6%9C%89%E8%B6%A3%E3%80%82%3Cbr%3E%E8%80%81%E8%88%8D%E6%98%AF%E5%85%AC%E8%AE%A4%E7%9A%84%E5%B9%BD%E9%BB%98%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88%E3%80%81%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88%E3%80%82%E4%BB%96%E7%9A%84%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97%E8%87%B3%E7%9C%9F%E8%87%B3%E7%BA%AF%EF%BC%8C%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%E4%BF%97%E7%99%BD%E7%94%9F%E5%8A%A8%E3%80%82%E5%AD%97%E9%87%8C%E8%A1%8C%E9%97%B4%E9%80%8F%E7%9D%80%E8%B4%A8%E6%9C%B4%E7%9A%84%E5%A4%A9%E7%9C%9F%E5%92%8C%E5%85%A5%E4%B8%96%E7%9A%84%E7%9D%BF%E6%99%BA%EF%BC%8C%E5%8F%88%E6%9C%89%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%A8%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E7%9A%84%E8%BE%9B%E8%BE%A3%E8%AE%BD%E5%88%BA%EF%BC%8C%E9%A5%B1%E5%90%AB%E5%AF%B9%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB%E7%9A%84%E6%80%9D%E8%80%83%EF%BC%8C%E8%AF%BB%E6%9D%A5%E6%9A%96%E5%BF%83%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%EF%BC%8C%E4%B8%8D%E5%BF%8D%E9%87%8A%E5%8D%B7%E3%80%82%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%E6%B5%B7%E6%8A%A5%EF%BC%9A%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cimg%20src%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fimages-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com%2Fimages%2FG%2F28%2FBOOK-Catalog%2Fcontent%2FAC4IB_B073L91FTR_0001_20170717.jpg%3E",
	    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,
	    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,
	    options = {},
	    iframeId = "bookDesc_iframe";
 
    function resizeCallback() {
        P.guardFatal("bookDescription", function() {
            // Get the line-height of the iframe
            var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);
            var iframeDocument = iframe.contentDocument;

            if (false && iframeDocument && iframeDocument.defaultView) {
                // Set the height to the number of lines specified
                var numLines = parseInt(0, 10);
 
                // Get the line-height of the iframe
                var iframeContent = iframeDocument.getElementById("iframeContent");
 
                // Compute the line height
                var lineHeight = iframeDocument.defaultView.getComputedStyle(iframeContent, null).getPropertyValue("line-height");

                // Parse the line height
                lineHeight = parseFloat(lineHeight);
                bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = Math.round(lineHeight * numLines);
            } else {
                var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById("bookDescription_feature_div").offsetTop;
                var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetTop;
                var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById("booksImageBlock_feature_div").offsetHeight;
                bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;
                if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {
                    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;
                }
            }
    		
            var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById("postBodyPS").offsetHeight;
 
            if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){
                if(document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display == "none"){
                    document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';
                    document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="block";
                    document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
                }
                else{
                    document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
                }
            }
            else{
                document.getElementById("outer_postBodyPS").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';
                document.getElementById("psPlaceHolder").style.display ="none";
                document.getElementById("bdSeeAllPrompt").style.display ="block";
                document.getElementById("bdSeeLessPrompt").style.display ="none";
                document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className = document.getElementById("bdExpanderIcon").className.replace("rotate","");
            }
        })();
    }

    options.iframeId = iframeId;
    options.iframeWrapperId = "bookDesc_iframe_wrapper";
	options.overriddenCSSId = "bookDesc_override_CSS";
	options.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;
	options.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;
	
	BookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);
	P.guardFatal("bookDescription", function() {
	    BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();
	}) ();
	    
	if ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {
	  P.when('jQuery').execute(function($) {
	    $(window).resize(function() {
	        P.guardFatal("bookDescription", function() {
	            BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	        }) ();
	    });

	    $(window).bind('imageResize', function() {
	        P.guardFatal("bookDescription", function() {
	            BookDescriptionIframe.resizeIframe(resizeCallback);
	        }) ();
	    });
	  });
	}
});
</script>


	                
                
            
        
        
        
        
        
        
    
    
    

    















    </div>

    </div>

             return;

            <li>
                
                
                
                
                
                
                    
                
                
                
                    
                
                

                <div id="pu_promoid_A1AJM5E2AXYH8R" class="a-section pu-lines">
