    <script type="text/javascript">
P.when("A","jQuery","cf").execute(function(A,$){
    window.registeredPromotionUpellComponent || P.register("PromotionUpellComponent",function() {
        var promotionUpsellContext = {
            asin:"B073L91FTR",
        };
        return {
            init: function(context) {
                if(!window.promotionUpsellRedemptionHelper){
                    A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption",{
                        redeemedCoupons : [],
                    });
                    window.promotionUpsellRedemptionHelper = true;
                }

                if(!window.promotionUpsellStateDataHelper){
                    A.state("promotionUpsellAsinData",{
                        visitedAsins : [],
                    });
                    window.promotionUpsellStateDataHelper = true;
                }
                $("#promotion-upsell .redeem-btn-wrapper").click(function(){
                    var isRecCust = context.isRecCust;

                    var $redeemBtnWrapper = $(this);
                    var $redeemBtn = $redeemBtnWrapper.find(".redeem-btn");
                    var $redeemedNote = $redeemBtnWrapper.siblings(".redeem-note");
                    var promoId = $redeemBtnWrapper.attr("promo-id");
                    $cardBox = $("#pu_promoid_" + promoId);
                    if (isRecCust) {
                        $redeemBtn.addClass("a-button-disabled");
                        $.ajax({
                            type: "GET",
                            url: "/gp/collect-coupon/handler/redeem-coupon-detailpage.html?ref_=pu_redeem_coupon",
                            data: {encryptedPromotionId: promoId},
                            dataType: "json",
                            success: function(resp) {
                                if (resp.status == 1) {
                                    $redeemBtn.remove();
                                    $redeemedNote.removeClass("a-hidden");
                                    P.when("ApplicablePromotionListComponent").execute(function(puComp) {
                                        puComp.showRedeemedNote(promoId);
                                    });

                                    var promotionUpsellRedemption = A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption");
                                    var visitedCoupons = promotionUpsellRedemption ? promotionUpsellRedemption.redeemedCoupons : null;

                                    if(visitedCoupons) {
                                          var isRedeemed = false;
                                          var i = visitedCoupons.length;
                                          while(i--){
                                               if(visitedCoupons[i] == promoId) {
                                                   isRedeemed = true;
                                                   break;
                                               }
                                           }
                                           if(!isRedeemed){
                                               visitedCoupons.push(promoId);
                                               promotionUpsellRedemption.redeemedCoupons = visitedCoupons;
                                               A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption",promotionUpsellRedemption);
                                           }
                                    }
                                } else {
                                    $redeemBtn.removeClass("a-button-disabled");
                                }
                            },
                            error: function() {
                                $redeemBtn.removeClass("a-button-disabled");
                            }
                        });
                    } else {
                        var curPath = encodeURIComponent(window.location.pathname+ "#promotion-upsell");
                        window.location.href = "/gp/collect-coupon/handler/redeem_coupon_after_login.html?path="
                            + curPath + "&encryptedPromotionId=" + promoId;
                    }
                });
            },
            getPromotionMessage : function(context) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: "GET",
                    url: "/gp/collect-coupon/handler/get_promotion_message.html?ref_=pu_get_message",
                    data: {
                        asin: context.asin,
                        merchantId: context.merchantId,
                        deviceType: context.deviceType,
                        template: context.template,
                        hasImage: 'none',
                    },
                    dataType: "json",
                    success: function(resp) {
                        if(resp.status == 1) {
                            for(var promoId in resp.data) {
                                 var $mesShortWithImg = $("#promotion-upsell #pu_promoid_" + promoId + "_truncated_message_img");
                                 var $mesShortWithoutImg = $("#promotion-upsell #pu_promoid_" + promoId + "_truncated_message");
                                 var $mesFull = $("#promotion-upsell #pu_promoid_" + promoId + "_full_message");
                                 if ($mesShortWithoutImg.length > 0 ) {
                                     $mesShortWithoutImg.html(resp.data[promoId]['fullDescription']);
                                 } else if($mesFull.length > 0) {
                                     $mesFull.html(resp.data[promoId]['fullDescription']);
                                 }
                             }
                        }
                    },
                    error: function() {
                    }
                });
            },
            showRedeemedNote: function(promoId) {
                var $cardBox = $("#pu_promoid_" + promoId);
                if ($cardBox) {
                    $cardBox.find(".redeem-btn").remove();
                    $cardBox.find(".redeem-note").removeClass("a-hidden");

                    var promotionUpsellRedemption = A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption");
                    var visitedCoupons = promotionUpsellRedemption ? promotionUpsellRedemption.redeemedCoupons : null;

                    if(visitedCoupons) {
                          var isRedeemed = false;
                          var i = visitedCoupons.length;
                          while(i--){
                               if(visitedCoupons[i] == promoId) {
                                   isRedeemed = true;
                                   break;
                               }
                           }
                           if(!isRedeemed){
                               visitedCoupons.push(promoId);
                               promotionUpsellRedemption.redeemedCoupons = visitedCoupons;
                               A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption",promotionUpsellRedemption);
                           }
                    }
                }
            },
            twisterHandler: function() {
                function isPromotionUpsellVisitedAsins(A) {
                    var asin = promotionUpsellContext.asin;
                    var promotionUpsellAsinData = A.state("promotionUpsellAsinData");
                    var visitedAsins = promotionUpsellAsinData ? promotionUpsellAsinData.visitedAsins : null;

                    if(visitedAsins) {
                        var isVisited = false;
                        var i = visitedAsins.length;
                        while(i--){
                            if(visitedAsins[i] == asin) {
                                isVisited = true;
                                break;
                            }
                        }
                        if(isVisited){
                            var promotionUpsellRedemption = A.state("promotionUpsellRedemption");
                            var visitedCoupons = promotionUpsellRedemption ? promotionUpsellRedemption.redeemedCoupons : null;
                            if(visitedCoupons) {
                                var i = visitedCoupons.length;
                                while(i--){
                                    var encryptedPromotionId = visitedCoupons[i];
                                    var $cardBox = $("#promotion-upsell #pu_promoid_" + encryptedPromotionId);
                                    if ($cardBox) {
                                        $cardBox.find(".redeem-btn").remove();
                                        $cardBox.find(".redeem-note").removeClass("a-hidden");
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            visitedAsins.push(asin);
                            promotionUpsellAsinData.visitedAsins = visitedAsins;
                            A.state("promotionUpsellAsinData",promotionUpsellAsinData);
                        }
                    }
                }
                isPromotionUpsellVisitedAsins(A);
            }
        };
    });
    window.registeredPromotionUpellComponent = true;
});
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    P.when("PromotionUpellComponent").execute(function(puComp) {
        puComp.init({
            isRecCust: false
        });
        puComp.getPromotionMessage({
            asin: 'B073L91FTR',
            deviceType: 'PC',
            promoSize: '1',
            merchantId: 'A1AJ19PSB66TGU',
            template: "one",
            hasImage: "none",
        });
        puComp.twisterHandler();
    });
    </script>
    
  </div>


	                
                
            
        
        
        
        
        
        
    
    
    

    















    </div>

<script language="JavaScript">
  var csrfParamsJson = {"csrf_rnd":"qH30H","csrf_token":"gJleHdwPS4Lzhk3XCX9FWaGd9VsR/6V1813IhrsAAAAJAAAAAFqYxidyYXcAAAAA","csrf_ts":1519961639};
  var csrfParamsStr = '';
  for (var attr in csrfParamsJson) {
    // encodeURIComponent required to correctly encode '+' sign
    // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1373414/ajax-post-and-plus-sign-how-to-encode
    csrfParamsStr = csrfParamsStr + attr + '=' +
      encodeURIComponent(csrfParamsJson[attr]) + '&';
  }
  csrfParamsStr = csrfParamsStr.slice(0, -1); // remove the last '&'

  validateAjaxResponse = function (response) {
    var result;
    if (typeof(response) == "object") {
      result = response;
    } else {
      try {
        result = eval ( "(" + response + ")" );
      } catch (e) {
        return;
      }
    }
    if (result.status == "page-requires-sign-in") {
      alert("请登录以继续");
      document.location.href = result.signInUrl +
        '&returnURI=' + document.location.pathname +
        '&returnParams=' + document.location.search;
      return 1;
    }
    if (result.status == "csrf-attack") {
      window.location.reload();
    }
  };
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

  var emailSmartLink_, smsSmartLink_;
  if(window.P && window.P.AUI_BUILD_DATE) {
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function(A, jQuery) {
    var kcpAppBaseObj_ = jQuery('.kcpAppBaseBox_');
    var kcpAppDialogObj_ = jQuery('.kcpAppsPopOverDialog_');
    var escChar = String.fromCharCode(0x5c);
    function isValidEmail(emailAddress) {
        //If email not supported or invalid email address return false
        if ( parseInt("") || (emailAddress && typeof emailAddress !== "string" )) {
            return false;
        }

        // validating only from @ to end
        var validator = new RegExp(escChar + "w+@[" + escChar +"w" + escChar + "-+_]+?" + escChar + ".[" + escChar + "w" + escChar + "-+_]+");
        return emailAddress.match( validator ) != null;
    }
    
    function isValidPhone(phoneNumber) {
        //If sms not supported or no input return false
        if ( parseInt("") || !phoneNumber ) {
            return false;
        }

        var validator = new RegExp("^([0-9" + escChar + "(" + escChar + ")" + escChar + "/" + escChar + "+" + escChar + "-]*)$");
        var digitsOnly = phoneNumber.replace(/D/g, '');
        return digitsOnly.length >= 9 && digitsOnly.length < 20 && phoneNumber.match(validator) != null; 
    }
    
    function appendCountryCode(phoneNumber) {
        var countryCode = "";
        if ( countryCode && isValidPhone(phoneNumber) && !phoneNumber.match(/^\+/g) ) {
            phoneNumber = countryCode + phoneNumber;
        }
        return phoneNumber;
    }
    
    var successMessage = "免费Kindle阅读软件已发送。请检查您的";
    var processError = "请求失败，请稍候再试。";
    var popupOptions = {
        "header": "下载免费Kindle阅读软件",
        "name": "kcpAppsPopOverDialog",
        "width": 650
    } 
    
    P.when("A", "a-modal", "ready").execute(function (A, modal) {
    //Remove the existing bindings if Any. Because multiple widgets on same page will create multiple popovers.
    var $trigger = kcpAppBaseObj_.find('.kcpAppsPopOver');
    modal.remove($trigger);
    var instance = modal.create($trigger, popupOptions);
    $trigger.bind("click", function() { 
      instance.show(); 
      return false;
    }); 
    A.on("a:popover:show:kcpAppsPopOverDialog", function(){
        jQuery.ajax({
                url: "/gp/digital/fiona/ajax/reftagCall.html/ref=kcpapp_?pf_rd_p=2a3c8551-c300-48c3-a831-b6c5c76206d0&pf_rd_s=kcpAppsWidget&pf_rd_t=201&pf_rd_i=B073L91FTR&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=MN4VGK1N662QKSAK29W7&pf_rd_r=MN4VGK1N662QKSAK29W7&pf_rd_p=2a3c8551-c300-48c3-a831-b6c5c76206d0",
                cache: false,
                type: 'GET'
            });
    });

    });

    function setSelector(element, downloadMessage, downloadUrl, tinyImage, emailSmartLink, smsSmartLink){
      emailSmartLink_ = emailSmartLink;
      smsSmartLink_ = smsSmartLink;
      kcpAppDialogObj_.find(".kcpAppDeviceUL .selectedElement").addClass("invisible");
      kcpAppDialogObj_.find(".kcpAppDeviceUL .kcpAppSelected").removeClass("kcpAppSelected");
      kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html("");
      jQuery(element).find(".selectedElement").removeClass("invisible");
      jQuery(element).find(".kcpAppDeviceListItem .mask img").addClass( "kcpAppSelected" );
      
      kcpAppDialogObj_.find("#kcpAppDownloadMessage").html(downloadMessage);
      if(tinyImage && downloadUrl){
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find("#kcpAppTinyImage").attr("src",tinyImage );
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find("#kcpAppDirectDownloadLink").show();
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find("#kcpAppDirectURL").attr("href", downloadUrl);
      } else{
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find("#kcpAppDirectDownloadLink").hide();
      }
    }

        kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppRecipient').unbind('keypress'); //Unbind previous clicks to avoid duplicate bindings.
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppRecipient').keypress(function(e){
            if (e.which == 13){
                kcpAppDialogObj_.find(".kcpAppSendButton").click();
            }
        });
        
        if(jQuery.browser && jQuery.browser.msie){
            kcpAppDialogObj_.find('[placeholder]').focus(function() {
              var input = jQuery(this);
              if (input.val() == input.attr('placeholder')) {
                input.val('');
                input.removeClass('placeholder');
              }
            }).blur(function() {
              var input = jQuery(this);
              if (input.val() == '' || input.val() == input.attr('placeholder')) {
                input.addClass('placeholder');
                input.val(input.attr('placeholder'));
              }
            }).blur();
        }
        
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find(".kcpAppSendButton").unbind("click"); //Unbind previous clicks to avoid duplicate bindings.
        kcpAppDialogObj_.find(".kcpAppSendButton").bind("click", function(){
           var recipient = kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppRecipient').val();
           var inputData = {
            "recipient" : appendCountryCode(recipient),
            "downloadLink" : (emailSmartLink_) ? emailSmartLink_ : "http://www.amazon.cn/gp/kindle/kcpApp.html",
            "toJSON" : "1"
           };
           if(isValidEmail(recipient)){
               inputData['communicationType'] = 'email';
               submitRTERequest(inputData);
           } else if(isValidPhone(recipient)){
               inputData['communicationType'] = 'sms';
               submitRTERequest(inputData);
               if(smsSmartLink_){
                 inputData[downloadLink] = smsSmartLink_;
               }
           } else {
               kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html("");
               kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryError').html("输入无效，请提供有效的手机号码或电子邮件地址。");
           }
        });

      function assignSampleOwnership(){
         var refTagSuffix = "";
         var client = refTagSuffix.split("_")[0];
         if (!client) client = "kcpAppWidget";

         var input = {
            sid       : "458-1397528-4141426",
            asin      : "",
            client    : client,
            site      : "RetailWebsite",
            encryptedDeviceType : "A2CTZ977SKFQZY"
         };

         jQuery.extend(input,csrfParamsJson);
         jQuery.ajax({
            url: "/gp/digital/fiona/ajax/fulfill-sample-ownership.html/ref=kcp_samp_" + refTagSuffix,
            type: "POST",
            dataType: "json",
            data: input
         });
      }

      function submitRTERequest(input){
        jQuery.extend(input,csrfParamsJson);
        jQuery.ajax({
                url: "/gp/digital/fiona/ajax/send-email-or-sms.html/ref=kcpapp_snt_",
                type: "POST",
                dataType: "json",
                data: input,
                beforeSend:function(){
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html("");
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryInProgress').html('<div style="text-align:center"><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/kindle/www/myk/icon_spinner._CB139841016_.gif" /> 正在处理您的请求…… </div>');
                },
                success:function(data){
                  kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryInProgress').html("");
                  if(typeof(data) == "string"){
                      data=JSON.parse(data);
                  }
                  if(data && data.status == 1) {
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess').html( successMessage + ((input.communicationType == 'email') ? " 电子邮件" : " 手机") +".");
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppRecipient').val("");
                  } else {
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html("");
                    data['message'] = (data.status) ? "Invalid Request" : data.message;
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryError').html(((data.message) ? data.message : processError));
                  }
                },
                error:function(){
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryInProgress').html("");
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html("");
                    kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryError').html(processError);
                }
            });
      }      

      jQuery.ajax({
            url: "/gp/digital/fiona/ajax/reftagCall.html/ref=kcpapp_load_",
            dataType: 'json',
            cache: false,
            type: 'GET'
      });
    });
  }
</script>

<div id="descriptionAndDetails" class="a-section a-spacing-extra-large">
    <div id="productDescription_feature_div" class="feature" data-feature-name="productDescription">




    

    
    
    
        
            
                
	                
	                
	                	



    
    <div id="productDescription_feature_div" data-feature-name="productDescription" data-template-name="productDescription" class="a-row feature">
         
            
            
                <div class="a-divider a-divider-section"><div class="a-divider-inner"></div></div>
               
                 
                 <h2 class="books">
                    商品描述
                    
                 </h2>
                
                
                

            
            
                
                   





    
    
        
        
             





<div id="s_wrap" class="a-section s-wrap">
    <div id="s_center" class="a-section s-center">
        <div id="s_menu" class="a-section s-menu">
            
                 <a id="s_menu_item_0" class="s-menu-item" href="#" hidefocus=""
                    onclick="return false;" data-tid="0">
                    &#32534;&#36753;&#25512;&#33616;
                 </a>
            
                 <a id="s_menu_item_1" class="s-menu-item" href="#" hidefocus=""
                    onclick="return false;" data-tid="1">
                    &#21517;&#20154;&#25512;&#33616;
                 </a>
            
                 <a id="s_menu_item_2" class="s-menu-item" href="#" hidefocus=""
                    onclick="return false;" data-tid="2">
                    &#20316;&#32773;&#31616;&#20171;
                 </a>
            
                 <a id="s_menu_item_3" class="s-menu-item" href="#" hidefocus=""
                    onclick="return false;" data-tid="3">
                    &#30446;&#24405;
                 </a>
            
                 <a id="s_menu_item_4" class="s-menu-item" href="#" hidefocus=""
                    onclick="return false;" data-tid="4">
                    &#25991;&#25688;
                 </a>
            
        </div>
        <div id="s_contents" class="s-contents" descUrl="/gp/product-description/ajaxGetProuductDescription.html?ref_=dp_apl_pc_loaddesc&asin=B073L91FTR&cacheTime=1519961639716&merchantId=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&deviceType=web">
            
                <div id="s_content_0" data-id="0" class="a-section s-content">
                     <h3>&#32534;&#36753;&#25512;&#33616;</h3>
                     <p>
                         
                         
                             1.百年经典：流传百年的幽默典范，直击心灵的质朴语言，不可不读的名篇佳作！<br>2.超值典藏：76篇足量典藏，特选10篇以上少见篇目。内容丰富，轻松幽默，一读到底。<br>3.精美设计：独家手绘6幅全彩插图，精心设计文字版式及装帧。让阅读更舒适，更享受。<br>4.精编精校：参照民国初刊本与《老舍全集》勘校。<br>
                         
                             
                     </p>
                </div>
            
                <div id="s_content_1" data-id="1" class="a-section s-content">
                     <h3>&#21517;&#20154;&#25512;&#33616;</h3>
                     <p>
                         
                         
                             1.我很喜欢老舍的作品。<br>——勒•克莱齐奥（法国著名文学家，2008年诺贝尔文学奖得主）<br>2.据我接触到的世界文学情报，全世界得到公认的中国新文学家也只有沈从文与老舍。<br>——朱光潜（中国著名美学家、文艺理论家、教育家、翻译家）<br>3.他的写作精力是惊人的。他又会利用他的时间，他在朋友谈话、社会活动和栽花、养猫之间，不断地完成着他的杰作。他的为人，更是和他的作品一样，爽朗、幽默、质朴、热情。<br>——冰心（中国著名诗人、作家、翻译家）<br>4.他的语言生动幽默，是地道的北京话，间或也夹上一点山东俗语。他没有许多作家那种忸怩作态让人读了感到浑身难受的非常别扭的文体，一种新鲜活泼的力量跳动在字里行间。……总之，老舍先生成了我毕生最喜爱的作家之一，我对他怀有崇高的敬意。<br>——季羡林（国际著名东方学大师、语言学家、文学家）<br>5.老舍为自己的故事引用广泛的材料，涉及到与民族悲剧处于同一水平的问题，以及普通人遇到的生活困难。尽管在所有描写中透露出幽默，但在它们上面又都印着痛苦和悲伤。<br>——司格林（俄罗斯著名汉学家、翻译家）<br>6.他的语言里没有市民口语中的那种俗气，他识别提炼之后，将这种语言变成了一种文化。<br>——姜昆（中国国家一级演员，相声演员）
                         
                             
                     </p>
                </div>
            
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
        
    


                 
                
                
            
        
    </div>


	                
                
            
        
        
        
        
        
        
    
    
    

    















    </div>
</div>

    <div id="aplus" class="a-section a-spacing-extra-large bucket">
        <hr noshade="true" size="1" class="bucketDivider"/>
        
            <h2> </h2>
        
        











    



    














    
    


<div class="aplus-v2 desktop celwidget" cel_widget_id="aplus">

id="customer-reviews-content" class="a-link-normal celwidget" href="#"></a><div id="cm-cr-dp-review-header" class="a-section a-spacing-medium"><h3 data-hook="top-customer-reviews-title">热门买家评论</h3></div><div class="a-row"><div class="a-section a-spacing-extra-large a-spacing-top-medium a-text-center review-load-error aok-hidden"><div class="a-box a-alert a-alert-error cr-error" aria-live="assertive" role="alert"><div class="a-box-inner a-alert-container"><h4 class="a-alert-heading">现在无法筛选评论。请稍后再试。</h4><i class="a-icon a-icon-alert"></i><div class="a-alert-content"></div></div></div></div><div class="a-spinner-wrapper cr-reviews-loading aok-hidden"><span class="a-spinner a-spinner-medium"></span></div><div class="a-section reviews-content filterable-reviews-content celwidget"><div id="cm-cr-dp-review-list" data-hook="top-customer-reviews-widget" class="a-section review-views celwidget"><div id="RUED61RIHNG3D" data-hook="review" class="a-section review"><div id="customer_review-RUED61RIHNG3D" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AEBYYOQ3VGKO4BFF3CZCC73FNWKQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/prod-cn-amazon-avatars/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"><noscript><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/prod-cn-amazon-avatars/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">南浔花满楼</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a class="a-link-normal" title="5.0 颗星，最多 5 颗星" href="/gp/customer-reviews/RUED61RIHNG3D/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B073L91FTR"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 颗星，最多 5 颗星</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/RUED61RIHNG3D/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B073L91FTR">老舍给我的震撼</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">2017年8月24日</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">版本: 平装</span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" aria-label="|"><span class="a-icon-alt">|</span></i><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">已确认购买</span></div><div class="a-row review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div aria-live="polite" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px; _height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">一 其实一直以来更倾心于古代文学，对于近现代的文学作品，总感觉少了些古意情调以及神秘感。老舍的文章也没有太多涉猎。直到前段时间才了解到，其实老舍是实至名归的诺贝尔文学奖获得者，当时名单里都定下他来了，只是因为他这时却沉湖自尽了，所以诺奖才颁给了川端康成。<br />二 在这样的背景下，我买下了这本老舍的散文集。每一篇细细读来，会感觉老舍这个人很有趣，这方面和王小波的文风略相似，不同的是老舍的更见朴实灵动。让我惊讶，原来他是这样幽默有趣的人，却又难过于这样一位生性乐观，喜欢嘲弄调侃的文坛巨匠却沉湖自尽。<br />三 不得不说，书名起得很好。天真的幽默家。一语道破了老舍至真至纯的赤子之心。让我感动的是，很多很小的细节，都能让他感慨家国命运，叹民生多艰。真正的大家之作，它一定是带着这种胸怀天下忧国忧民的心胸气度在里面的。</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;阅读更多&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;阅读更少&quot;}"><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">阅读更多</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments"><a class="a-link-normal" href="/gp/customer-reviews/RUED61RIHNG3D/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_btm?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B073L91FTR#wasThisHelpful"><span class="review-comment-total aok-hidden">0</span><span data-hook="review-comment"       10 个人发现此评论有用.
    </span>

      </a></span></span></div>
  </span></span><span><span class="a-letter-space"></span><span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" class="a-size-base a-link-normal a-color-tertiary report-abuse-link a-text-normal" href="/ss/customer-reviews/report-abuse?ie=UTF8&voteDomain=Reviews&ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_hlp&csrfT=gE6ZrHjrQ63WiQoSYkiQf3i8OU8u%2FqjtraFYWZQAAAAJAAAAAFqYxidyYXcAAAAA&entityId=RUED61RIHNG3D&sessionId=458-1397528-4141426">报告滥用情况</a></span></span></div></div></div><div id="R16DN6KSDPN3TE" data-hook="review" class="a-section review"><div id="customer_review-R16DN6KSDPN3TE" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AHMUN2B5L3QVXYI46337HSITWFZQ/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/prod-cn-amazon-avatars/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"><noscript><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/prod-cn-amazon-avatars/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Sinyonde</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a class="a-link-normal" title="5.0 颗星，最多 5 颗星" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R16DN6KSDPN3TE/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B073L91FTR"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">5.0 颗星，最多 5 颗星</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R16DN6KSDPN3TE/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B073L91FTR">信笔而来的幽默</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">2018年1月7日</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary">版本: Kindle电子书</span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" aria-label="|"><span class="a-icon-alt">|</span></i><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">已确认购买</span></div><div class="a-row review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div aria-live="polite" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px; _height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">现在的进度是10%，看到老舍在新加坡任教的那段经历。<br /><br />《一些印象》和《更大一些的想象》是描写济南的文章。老舍的视角，好似一个孩童，用他那双圆溜溜的大眼睛打量这这个世界；那语气，又仿佛是少女拂过花朵那样的温柔。看到了初中课本中的选段，济南的冬天。不过这次有幸看到了老舍眼中济南的春秋冬夏。<br /><br />“有这样的山，再配上那蓝的天，晴暖的阳光；蓝得像要由蓝变绿了， 可又没完全绿了；晴暖得要发燥了，可是有点凉风，正和诗一样的温柔；这便是济南的秋。”<br /><br />还看到他挤兑济南那高低不平的路，又看到他调侃马车的价格，“为平他的气，我赶快问：‘到——大学，多少钱？’他说了一个数儿。我心平气和的说：‘我并不是要买贵马与尊车。’”我笑了出来。后面‘瘦病’之马把行李颠了出来压坏了箱子，他这么写“心中颇不自在，怨自己‘以貌取马’，那知人家居然能掀起后蹄而跑数步之遥呢。”我更是笑得直打跌。<br /><br />原来他还在伦敦留学过。看他描写伦敦的那一幕幕，和现实真是高度重合。不禁感叹，自己正在这座他留学过的地方，还蛮幸运的。<br /><br />看这本书的时候，老舍真像一位茶话会上的茶友，用好玩儿的语气像我讲述他经历的那些事情，他看到的那些美景，他对济南的偏爱……啊哦，今天就先到这儿吧，老舍，明天下午再一起喝茶吧~</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" data-action="a-expander-toggle" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">不会写书评但还是想说这本书的书名起的很贴切，封面是一只站在窗边的猫，一入眼就多了几分有趣，打开书最先看到的也不是目录，而是几张插画，像是不经意的涂鸦，简单但是也能让人看出吐槽，再加上有些是生活中的场景更是让人有同感，到了正文，是老舍先生的所见所感，里面有很多嘲讽，但是给人的感受不会特别压制，具体的我就不剧透，总的来说这本书还是值得读的</div><div <script type="text/javascript">
var ma_doc;
var DPCL;
var ma_clicked = 0;
var ma_lastCheck = 0; // timestamp to prevent us messing with the DOM too often
var ma_initCP = 0; // init check pending flag to prevent queueing up of multiple event handler calls
var topCalculatedForNONIE = 0;
  var isAUI = typeof P === 'object' && typeof P.when === 'function';
  function adjustProdDetWithMiniATF(jQuery,feature){
    var productDetailsOffset = 0;
    if(jQuery(feature).offset() !== null){
      productDetailsOffset = jQuery(feature).offset().top;
    }
    var miniATFHeight = jQuery('#gTTLink').height();
    if (productDetailsOffset > 0 && miniATFHeight > 0) {
	    jQuery(document).scrollTop(productDetailsOffset - miniATFHeight - 9);
    }
}

var showHideMiniATF = function($,isResizeEvent) {
  // Haven't serviced last one yet!
  if(ma_initCP && !isResizeEvent) { return ; }

  // Don't look at the DOM more than once every 400ms
  var lastCheckDiff = new Date().getTime() - ma_lastCheck;
  var checkDelay = (lastCheckDiff < 100 ? 100 - lastCheckDiff : 10);

  ma_initCP = 1;        

  var initIfNeeded = function() {
      // show miniATF if Y offset is > 850px else hide it, and show/hide with 200ms delay
      var yPos = ma_doc.scrollTop(), miniATF = $("#gTTLink");
      var dealPriceRow = $("#dealPriceRow");
      var goldBox = $("#goldBoxBuyBoxDivId");

      if( yPos > 650 ){
        if (dealPriceRow.is(':visible') || goldBox.is(':visible') ) { return; }     
          if( !ma_clicked && miniATF.is(':hidden')){
             miniATF.slideDown(200);
        }
      } else {
        if(miniATF.is(':visible')) 
          miniATF.slideUp(200);
        ma_clicked=0;
      }

      ma_initCP = 0;
      ma_lastCheck = new Date().getTime();
  };

  // Call this function outside of the scroll handler to avoid slowing down scrolling
  setTimeout(initIfNeeded, checkDelay);
};
if(isAUI){
        P.when('cf').execute(function(){
          P.when('jQuery','ready').execute(function($){
            ma_doc = $(window);
            $("#gTTLink .ma-back-img").addClass("nav-sprite");
            ma_doc.scroll(function(){showHideMiniATF($,0);});
            ma_doc.resize(function(){showHideMiniATF($,1);});
            var nonHoverState = function(){
             $("#gTTLink .ma-title").css("color", "#333");
            };
            $("#gTTLink .maplink, #gTTLink .ma_seeall, #gTTLink .goto-top, #gTTLink .see-all-buying-options").click(function(){
              ma_clicked=1;
              if( $(this).hasClass("maplink")){ $(this).attr("href", "javascript:void(0);"); }
              $("#gTTLink").slideUp();
              $("body,html").animate({scrollTop: 0}, 300);
              nonHoverState();
              return false;
            });
            $("#gTTLink .can-add-to-cart").click(function(){
              $("#gTTLink .can-add-to-cart").unbind('click');
              $("#gTTLink .can-add-to-cart a").children().click();
            });
           $("#gTTLink .ma-title").hover(function(){
             $("#gTTLink .ma-title").css("color", "#E47911");
           }, nonHoverState);
         });
        });
      }
</script>
</div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    // Only execute if performance object is defined in JS
    if(typeof performance!= "undefined" && typeof performance.getEntries != "undefined") {




        var metaAssetNames = [];
        metaAssetNames.push("MediaDetailPageMetaAsset");
        if(metaAssetNames.length > 0)  {
            for(assetIndex = 0; assetIndex < metaAssetNames.length; assetIndex ++) {
	     var metaAssetName = metaAssetNames[assetIndex];
             var re = new RegExp("\\.css\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
             for(i = 0; i < performance.getEntries().length; i++) {	   	
                var dpEntry = performance.getEntries()[i];
		var res = dpEntry.name.match(re);
                if(res && dpEntry.initiatorType  && dpEntry.initiatorType == "link") {
                    var dpmaDuration = dpEntry.duration;
                    ue.count(metaAssetName +".duration", dpmaDuration);
                    if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "Cached");
                    } else {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "NotCached");
                    }
                    ue.count(metaAssetName + ".startTime", dpEntry.startTime);
                }
	      }
	    }
        }
        else {
                ue.count("DPMANoMetaAsset", 1);
        }

        for(i = 0 ; i < performance.getEntries().length ; i++) {
            var name = performance.getEntries()[i].name ;
            var res = name.match(/\.css\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/);
	    var initiatorType = performance.getEntries()[i].initiatorType;
            if(res && initiatorType && initiatorType == "link") {
                var duration = performance.getEntries()[i].duration ;
                ue.count("aui.duration", duration);
                ue.count("aui.startTime", performance.getEntries()[i].startTime);
                if(duration < 50) {
                    csmTag = "auiCached";
                }
                else {
                    csmTag = "auiNotCached";
                }

                if(window.ue && ue.tag) {
                    ue.tag(csmTag);
                }
                break;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function prefetchTYPAssets() {
    var imageAssets = new Array();
    var jsCssAssets = new Array();
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/review-1-click-order._CB244633218_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/x-locale/common/buttons/continue-shopping._CB192562300_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/x-locale/common/buy-buttons/thank-you-elbow._CB244842341_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/x-locale/communities/social/snwicons_v2._CB398069924_.png");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/checkout/assets/carrot._CB192194608_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/yellow-rounded-corner-sprite._CB192194728_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/checkout/thank-you-page/assets/white-rounded-corner-sprite._CB212531443_.gif");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gno/sprites/global-sprite-32-v1._CB330175699_.png");
      imageAssets.push("https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._CB386947693_.gif");

    // pre-fetching image assets
    for (var i=0; i<imageAssets.length; i++) {
       new Image().src = imageAssets[i];
    }
    // pre-fetching css and js assets based on different browser types
    var isIE = /*@cc_on!@*/0;
    var isFireFox = /Firefox/.test(navigator.userAgent);
    if (isIE) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        new Image().src = jsCssAssets[i];
      }
    }
    else if (isFireFox) {
      for (var i=0; i<jsCssAssets.length; i++) {
        var o =  document.createElement("object");
        o.data = jsCssAssets[i];
        o.width = o.height = 0;
        document.body.appendChild(o);
      }
    }
}

    var onload = function () {
        setTimeout(prefetchTYPAssets, 2000);
    };
    if (window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("load", onload);
    } else if (window.attachEvent) { /* for <= IE 8 */
        window.attachEvent("onload", onload);
    }
</script>
